thread.title: BRIEF-HNA Infrastructure Investment's Controlling Shareholder Used 20 Mln Company Shares As Collateral

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-HNA Infrastructure Investment's Controlling Shareholder Used 20 Mln Company Shares As Collateral

organizations.name: hna infrastructure investment group co ltd
brief-hna infrastructure investment's controlling shareholder used 20 mln company

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - HNA Infrastructure Investment Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER HAS USED 20 MILLION SHARES IN THE COMPANY AS COLLATERAL ON FEB 13 TO BOOST LIQUIDITY Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2Br7bvA Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
